name: Vegetarian Thai Fried Rice Recipe (Khao Pad)
description: Vegetarian Thai fried rice with simple ingredients, ready in no more than 20 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Dice up the vegetables to speed up the stir-frying.
recipeInstructions.name: Dice up the vegetables to speed up the stir-frying.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a non-stick wok or skillet over medium-high heat. Add oil and spread evenly across the bottom of your pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat a non-stick wok or skillet over medium-high heat. Add oil and spread evenly across the bottom of your pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Add diced vegetables into the pan. Stir-fry until the vegetables are nearly cooked through. The larger you cut your vegetables, the longer you have to stir-fry, which is why we diced them.
recipeInstructions.name: Add diced vegetables into the pan. Stir-fry until the vegetables are nearly cooked through. The larger you cut your vegetables, the longer you have to stir-fry, which is why we diced them.

recipeInstructions.text: Add sauces and seasonings (mushroom sauce, light soy sauce, and white sugar) and thoroughly mix with the veggies.
recipeInstructions.name: Add sauces and seasonings (mushroom sauce, light soy sauce, and white sugar) and thoroughly mix with the veggies.

recipeInstructions.text: Add cold rice into the mix and thoroughly combine. Use your spatula to press and separate the rice if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Add cold rice into the mix and thoroughly combine. Use your spatula to press and separate the rice if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Continue to cook for 2 to 4 minutes, depending on the heat of your stove top. Consistently toss and stir to prevent burning. Garnish and serve immediately.
recipeInstructions.name: Continue to cook for 2 to 4 minutes, depending on the heat of your stove top. Consistently toss and stir to prevent burning. Garnish and serve immediately.

review.reviewBody: Hey! The salty flavor comes from the light soy sauce, no need to add extra salt. Enjoy!
looks yummy! Why don't you add salt in it? Is rice already salty?

keywords: khao pad, thai fried rice, vegetarian fried rice, vegetarian thai fried rice
